Class ConfigControlCls

org.hackVueling.control.ConfigControlCls
public class ConfigControlCls extends Object
Classe to control all actions of Configuration on Control layer.

    • getInstance

      public static ConfigControlCls getInstance()

    • addCity

      public int addCity(String nameIn)
      Method to add a city on ddbb
      Parameters:
      nameIn - city name
      Returns:
      0 = city added ok; 1 = some error with DDBB; 2 = city exist; 3 = error adding city to ddbb; 4 = City name is empty.

    • addFlight

      public int addFlight(String cityName, String departureTime)
      Method to add a flight on ddbb.
      Parameters:
      cityName - Name of departure city.
      departureTime - Departure time, format 'hh:mm'
      Returns:
      0 = added correctly; 1 = some error with DDBB; 2 = city no exist; 3 = error adding flight to ddbb.

    • addHotel

      public int addHotel(String hotelName, String cityName, int idCategory)
      Method to add a new hotel to ddbb.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - Hotel's name.
      cityName - Name of hotel's city.
      idCategory - ID of hotel's category.
      Returns:
      0 = added correctly; 1 = some error with DDBB; 2 = city no exist; 3 = error adding hotel to ddbb.

    • addAirTrip

      public int addAirTrip(AirTrip airTripIn, List<String> citiesNameListIn)
      Method to manage the Air Trip Creation.
      Parameters:
      airTripIn - Air Trip classe, to create.
      citiesNameListIn - List of cities what Air Trip visited.
      Returns:
      0 = added correctly; 1 = some error with DDBB; 2 = city class is null; 3 = citisNameList empty

    • addLandTrip

      public int addLandTrip(LandTrip landTripIn, List<String> citiesNameListIn)
      Method to manage the Air Trip Creation.
      Parameters:
      landTripIn - Land Trip classe, to create.
      citiesNameListIn - List of cities what Land Trip visited.
      Returns:
      0 = added correctly; 1 = some error with DDBB; 2 = city class is null; 3 = citisNameList empty

    • checkCity

      public int checkCity(String cityName)
      Method to check if the city name exist.
      Parameters:
      cityName - Name to city
      Returns:
      0 = city exist; 1 = some error with DDBB; 2 = city doesn't exist; 3 = city name is empty.

    • checkTrip

      public int checkTrip(String tripName)
      Method to check if the trip name exist.
      Parameters:
      tripName - Name to city
      Returns:
      0 = trip name doesn't exist; 1 = some error with DDBB; 2 = trip exist; 3 = trip name is empty.

    • checkHotel

      public int checkHotel(String hotelName)
      Method to check if the hotel's name exist.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - Name to hotel.
      Returns:
      0 = hotel's name doesn't exist; 1 = some error with DDBB; 2 = hotel exist; 3 = hotel name is empty.
